title: Arista rolls out new routing capabilities for cloud-first companies
description: New cloud routing protocols combine functions across cloud, carrier, and enterprise networks.

title: One bad experience is all it takes to lose a customer
description: Companies that embrace a "whole office" product strategy will break down organizational barriers and create compelling customer experiences, according to research on how consumers define brand loyalty in today's digital-first economy.

title: AirPods deal: Apple AirPods Max are $120 off on Amazon
description: Want to pair your latest iPhone with new Apple AirPods Max headphones? This is the lowest price we've seen since the start of summer.

title: Gaming monitor deal: Samsung Odyssey Neo G9 is $500 off
description: Samsung's Odyssey Neo G9 gaming monitor is gorgeous, and it's on sale right now. You can save $500 on it right now, thanks to Discover Samsung week.

title: Watch a robot excavator controlled like a videogame
description: I could watch this robot excavator dig all day. Remote control could also make excavation safer and more economical.

title: Is this the ultimate Windows docking station? Meet the Accell Thunderbolt 4
description: The convenience provided by this tiny desktop companion is hard to overstate. It's great for Macs, too, except for one thing.

title: How Cockpit can help you more easily manage your Linux machines
description: This Linux web-based GUI helps make admin tasks a breeze.

title: How to switch to a Prime Student membership
description: If you're a student wanting to save money during the school year, here are the steps to switch an Amazon Prime membership to the Student version.

title: OpenWallet seeks to open-source your digital wallet
description: Do you use a digital wallet? Would you like to use only one wallet instead of several of them? Then, the newly launched OpenWallet Foundation deserves your attention.

title: How to use Adobe Lightroom: Everything beginners should know
description: Are you wondering how to fix an under-exposed image or blur the background in a street shoot? ZDNET has you covered.

title: Linus Torvalds talks Rust on Linux, his work schedule, and life with his M2 MacBook Air
description: At the 2022 Linux Plumbers Conference, Torvalds and I have a chance to sit down and talk again about life, Linux, and scuba diving.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 deal: Save $146 on the wireless headphones
description: One of the best noise canceling headphones can be yours for only $253 if you're open to ordering a certified refurbished pair.

title: How to rename your Android phone for easier Bluetooth management
description: Jack Wallen shows you how you can remove some possible confusion with Bluetooth on Android by renaming your device.

title: Looking for wireless gaming earbuds? The EPOS GTW 270 are next level
description: Review: The hybrid design of Bluetooth and 2.4Ghz pairing make this one of the most pleasant earbuds I've ever tested.

title: How to change Siri's voice
description: Siri can be a roadblock in your to-do list, or your go-to, depending on how you use it. But changing its voice can make the voice assistant more inclusive and, let's admit it, more fun.

title: The HomePod mini is for Sirious Apple users only
description: Review: The death of the HomePod gave way to the success of the HomePod mini -- a must for an Apple ecosystem smart home, but just a cute, overpriced speaker for anyone else.

title: Save up to $1,500 on a Samsung 85-inch 8K smart TV
description: If you're in the market for a massive, future-proof TV with beautiful, crisp picture and an Infinity Screen, this is the deal for you.

title: The best GoPro accessory? It's not what you'd think
description: No, it's not a gimbal or lights or a different lens. It's a replacement battery door. But it has a super handy feature.

title: Save up to $1,500 on a new Samsung 85" 8K smart TV
description: If you're in the market for a massive, future-proof TV, this might be the deal for you.

title: The future of the web will need a different sort of software developer
description: Web3, ambient computing and the Metaverse all sound exciting, but they will be matched by changes to what developers do, too.

title: GoPro HERO11 Black first look: The world's best action camera gets even better
description: GoPro released three new cameras in the HERO11 Black line today.

title: Microsoft expands its Azure Space satellite-connectivity options
description: Microsoft is continuing its push to bring the Azure cloud to space to address the needs of satellite vendors and enterprise customers, both.

title: Exhausted by software updates? These Microsoft apps can now update even when your PC is locked
description: Microsoft streamlines app updates to minimize disruptions for users and cut down on update notifications.

title: NASA says space junk is one of the great challenges of our time. Here's why
description: As low-Earth orbit gets crowded, NASA takes the threat of orbital debris seriously.

title: Logitech's new Brio 500 webcam is smarter and cheaper than the competition
description: Autoframing via an ultra-wide lens, Show Mode for top-down demos, and a $129 price tag, just in time for the hybrid era of work.

title: Logitech's new Brio 505 webcam is smarter and cheaper than the competition
description: Autoframing via an ultra-wide lens, Show Mode for top-down demos, and a $129 price tag, just in time for the hybrid era of work.

title: Canva Docs gives you an easy way to add more visuals to your documents
description: Canva is already a popular design platform. Its newest product is competing with ubiquitous workplace programs like Microsoft Word and Google Docs.
